text: akasabhumikalilullatellam allahu ariyunnuntenn ni manas'silakkunnille? munnalukalkkitayilearu rahasyabhasanavum natakkunnilla; nalamanayi allahuvillate. allenkil ancalukalkkitayil svakarya bhasanam natakkunnilla; aramanayi avanillate. ennam itinekkal kurayatte, kutatte, avar eviteyumakatte, allahu avareateappamunt. pinne avarentan ceytukeantirunnatenn punarut'thana nalil avare unarttukayum ceyyum. allahu sarvajnanan; tircca
